content: ZURICH  May 4 Swiss agrichemicals group Syngenta  on Wednesday named J. Erik Fyrwald  chief executive of U.S. chemistry distribution company Univar Inc  as CEO from June 1. He succeeds John Ramsay  who has been ad interim CEO since November 2015.
name: Univar Inc
title: Syngenta names Univar exec Fyrwald as CEO from June 1
